##Introduction  

I will predict gold presence from other minerals

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
dn <- read.csv("deadwoodnorth.csv")
ds <- read.csv("deadwoodsouth.csv")
ld <- read.csv("lead.csv")
#tn <- read_csv("tinton.csv")
#sp <- read_csv("spearfish.csv")
```

```{r}
sites <- rbind(dn, ds, ld)
sites
```

```{r}
str(sites)
```


```{r}
s1 <- sites % select(
  dep_id,
  latitude,
  longitude,
  commod1,
  commod2,
  commod3,
  ore,
)
```
